name: Long Phuoc Garden House Area Tour
description: Depart from Bach Dang Wharf for a scenic cruise by speedboat along Saigon river to the lower section of Dong Nai River, passing by Saigon Seaport, Den Do Crossing, Cat Lai Seaport, Coconut islet, Nhon Trach Golf course. On arrival at Long Phuoc ward, a miniature of Mekong Detla, you will visit a local garden house, where you can explore the pastoral life and enjoy seasonal fruit. Lunch of country delicacies and music performance by an amateur band will be add more excitement to the trip.
